title: 751. Lincoln Riley on Culture, Recruiting & His Philosophy + Top 10 QBs
itunes:title: 751. Lincoln Riley on Culture, Recruiting & His Philosophy + Top 10 QBs
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. To start off, the guys are joined by new USC head coach Lincoln Riley, as he discusses the type of players he wants to recruit, his strategy for success, how appealing talent in Southern California is, what the secret sauce was for the top players he developed in the past, and much more. Then, the pair each list their top 10 quarterbacks right now, as they discuss if Minnesota Vikings quarterback Kirk Cousins is a top 10 quarterback ahead of the Vikings Thursday Night Football matchup against the Pittsburgh Steelers.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
